snippet: As part of the Science Channel's "Are We Alone" month, Morgan Freeman guides us through an assessment of how we humans would fare in a war against aliens.
abstract: As part of the Science Channel's "Are We Alone" month, Morgan Freeman guides us through an assessment of how we humans would fare in a war against aliens.

headline.main: Channel Surfing: 'Through the Wormhole: Will We Survive First Contact?'
